icad-lisp.description: The Visual Studio Code Extension for IntelliCAD Lisp
icad-lisp.loadcurrentfile.title: Load File into IntelliCAD
icad-lisp.openwebhelp.title: Open Online Help
icad-lisp.regionsnippet.title: Insert Region
icad-lisp.commentdefun.title: Generate Documentation
icad-lisp.configuration.title: IntelliCAD® LISP Debugger
icad-lisp.configuration.maxlinechars.des: Suggested maximum number of characters to display on each line. Value must be 60 or greater.
icad-lisp.configuration.narrowstyleinden: Indentation value used in the Narrow Formatting Style of function arguments. Value must be in the range of 1 and 6.
Controls the style of closing parenthesis. Closing parenthesis is placed on the same line as the function or aligned with the function’s opening parenthesis.
icad-lisp.configuration.longlistformatst: Controls the format style of long lists. Each or multiple parameters of a function are placed on separate lines.
icad-lisp.configuration.helptargetyear: Target IntelliCAD release for the 'Open Online Help' command.
icad-lisp.configuration.macfilter.desc: Enabling this feature will remove Windows-Only fuctions from auto-completion results while using Mac OS
icad-lisp.configuration.attachprocess.de: Process name to filter on for Debug Attach.
icad-lisp.configuration.launchprogram.de: Absolute path to the IntelliCAD executable.
icad-lisp.configuration.launchtimeout.de: The maximum amount of time to wait until a DAP connection is established.
icad-lisp.debug.attachconfig.desc: user settings for process list filter param.
icad-lisp.debug.config.snippet.desc: A new configuration for 'debugging' a user selected lisp file
icad-lisp.debug.launchconfig.desc: user settings for IntelliCAD path and startup parameters.

icad-lisp.project.closeproject.title: Close Project
icad-lisp.project.addfile.title: Add File to Project
icad-lisp.project.addworkspacefile.title: Add File to LISP Project
icad-lisp.project.removefile.title: Remove File from Project
icad-lisp.project.saveproject.title: Save Project
